articles.title: Amazon sets up Bazaar to sell unbranded, low value items in India - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Amazon Bazaar will compete with SoftBank-backed Meesho and Flipkart’s Shopsy. The platform will largely sell unbranded products, including apparel, watches, shoes, jewellery, and luggage, all priced below Rs 600.
articles.content: E-commerce giant Amazon has finally launched Bazaar, the destination for low-priced, unbranded fashion items and lifestyle products for value customers, the landing page of the app revealed. With the… [+2013 chars]
